attributes.action: Increase pay of Nursery nurses/practitioners to reflect the responsobilities
attributes.background: Nursery Nurses (lvl 3) are under a great deal of pressure and stress from caring for and educating pre-school children. The level of constant paperwork is very demanding and workers are paid the minimum possible amount which does not reflect the demands of employers and government departments.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it is about a matter which the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. 

The level of pay for nursery nurses who are not employees of the Government is a matter for the businesses that employ them. You could start a new petition asking Parliament or Government to set a higher minimum wage for nursery nurses.
